sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios';
import cookies from 'react-cookies';

export let endpoints = {
    "tours" : "/tour/",
    "add_tag" : '/tour/add_tag/',
    
    "tag" : "/tags/",

    "detail" : (tourID) => `/tour/${tourID}/list_detail/`,
    "tour_total" : (tourID) => `/tour/${tourID}/`,
    "add_tour_detail" : (tourID) => `/tour/${tourID}/add_tour_detail/`,
    "tour_detail": (tourdetailId) => `/tour_detail/${tourdetailId}/`,
    
    "tour_detail_all" : '/tour_detail/',

    'all_cmt' : '/cmt_tour/',
    'cmt' : (tourdetailid) => `/tour_detail/${tourdetailid}/comment/`,
    "add_cmt": (tourdetailId) => `/tour_detail/${tourdetailId}/add_comment/`,

    "rating" : (cmtId) => `/tour_detail/${cmtId}/add_rating/`,

    "booking" : (bookingid) =>`/tour_detail/${bookingid}/add_booking/`,
    "booking_detail" : `/user/booking_detail/`,
    "update_booking" : (tourdetailId) =>`/tour_detail/${tourdetailId}/update_booking/`,
    'all_booking' : '/booking/',


    'static_year' : '/booking/static_year/',

    'register': '/user/',
    'get_user': (userID) =>`/user/${userID}/`,
    'update': '/user/update_info/',
    'forgot_password':'/user/forgot_password/',

    'get_blog' : '/blog/' ,
    'detail_blog' : (blogID) => `/blog/${blogID}/` ,
    'like': (blogID) => `/blog/${blogID}/like/`,

    'current_user': '/user/current_user/',
    'login': '/o/token/',
    "oauth2-info": '/oauth2-info/',

    'transport' : '/transport/',
}

export let AuthAPI = axios.create({
    baseURL: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/',
    headers: {
        'Authorization': `Bearer ${cookies.load('access_token')}`
    }
})
export default axios.create({
    baseURL: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/',
})
